description: This is a modern 'Pods View' dashboard for your Kubernetes cluster(s). Made for kube-prometheus-stack and take advantage of the latest Grafana features. GitHub repository: https://github.com/dotdc/grafana-dashboards-kubernetes

targets.expr: sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", image!=""}[$__rate_interval])) by (container) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", unit="core"}) by (container)

sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", image!=""}[$__rate_interval])) by (container) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", unit="core"}) by (container)

panels.title: CPU Usage / Requests & Limits by container

targets.expr: sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", image!=""}) by (container) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", unit="byte"}) by (container)

sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", image!=""}) by (container) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", unit="byte"}) by (container)

panels.title: Memory Usage / Requests & Limits by container

list.description: TODO switch to label_argocd_argoproj_io_instance (but only parent/owner objects have it)
list.name: helm_release_filter

title: Kubernetes / Views / Pods - updated
